title: New Zealand Luxury Lodge in the Southern Alps with All-Inclusive Dining, Nightly Cocktails & NZ$100 Resort Credit
description:
Cradled in the foothills of New Zealand’s Southern Alps, this breathtaking retreat delivers panoramic views of Sugarloaf Mountain, rolling paddocks and the glassy expanse of Lake Pearson - all in a single, awe-inspiring sweep. Boutique sophistication takes centre stage across luxurious villas and suites, boasting organic textures, floor-to-ceiling windows and direct access to Arthur’s Pass National Park.

After a day of hiking, skiing or immersive farm experiences - from horse riding to sheep mustering - unwind at the lodge’s intimate restaurant, Sugarloaf. Native ingredients and fine New Zealand wines shine on a seasonal tasting menu, celebrating the rich bounty of this historic high-country sheep station.
offer_address: Great Alpine Highway, Craigieburn Valley, Lake Pearson 7580, New Zealand

title: Boutique New Zealand Luxury Lodge in the Southern Alps with Farm-to-Table Dining & Wilderness Experiences
description:
Tucked away in the heart of New Zealand's Southern Alps, this stay is a haven of tranquillity and adventure. This mountain retreat offers easy access to the world-renowned Arthur's Pass National Park, where hiking trails and breathtaking vistas abound.

After a day of exploration, retreat to the lodge's cosy restaurant, Sugarloaf, where you can savour locally sourced dishes paired with fine New Zealand wines. For those seeking relaxation, the lodge's tranquil gardens provide the perfect setting to sit back with a good book and a warm drink.
offer_address: Great Alpine Highway, Craigieburn Valley, Lake Pearson 7580, New Zealand
